name: Introduction to React Native
description: Learning the basics of React Native development and build your first mobile app.

syllabus.content: Overview of React Native, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple mobile app using React Native components.

name: The Complete Python Bootcamp From Zero to Hero in Python
description: Learn Python like a Professional Start from the basics and go all the way to creating your own applications and games.
prerequisites: Beginners who have never programmed before.
Intermediate Python programmers who want to level up their skills!

syllabus.content: Overview of Python, setting up your development environment.
Creating a simple backend app using Python.

name: JavaScript Web Projects: 4 Projects to Build Your Portfolio
description: Modern HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to build Responsive and Mobile Friendly projects for your dream portfolio and resume!
prerequisites: New or junior developers who want to learn modern JavaScript
Programmers who want to learn frontend web development
IDevelopers who know the basics of JavaScript and want to deepen their knowledge

syllabus.content: Spock Rock Game - Confetti.js, Modules
Countdown App - Date, localStorage
Calculator - Math Methods
Joke Teller - Fetch, Async/Await, Joke API, Text-to-Speech

name: Machine Learning Practical Workout | 4 Real-World Projects
instructor: Dr. Ryan Ahmed, SuperDataScience Team, Mitchell Bouchard, Ligency Team
description: Build 4 Practical Projects and Go from Zero to Hero in Deep/Machine Learning, Artificial Neural Networks
prerequisites: Data Scientists who want to apply their knowledge on Real World Case Studies
Deep Learning practitioners who want to get more Practical Assigmetns
Machine Learning Enthusiasts who look to add more projects to their Portfolio

syllabus.content: Introduction to the course, Anaconda and Jupyter Installation
Artificial Neural Networks - Car sale prediction
Deep Neural Networks - CIFAR -10 Classification
LE-NET Deep Network - Traffic sign classification
Natural Language Processing - E-Mail Spam Filter

name: Next.js Projects - 4 NextJS 4 projects (Instagram, Google.)
description: BNext.js 14 (reactjs framework) Projects. 4 NextJS 14 projects. IMDB, Instagram, Twitter, Google clone using Next js 14
prerequisites: Developers who want to start using NextJS and build real-world applications
Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, Javascript and React

syllabus.content: use TMBD database,style with Tailwind CSS
use Firebase for database and storage, style with Tailwind CSS, authenticate using next-auth, apply like and comment functionality, add upload functionality and use Image tag  ofnextjs
style with Tailwind CSS, authenticate using next-auth, use google search api, include web and image search
style with Tailwind CSS,authenticate using next-auth and Firebase auth,apply like and comment functionality, add upload functionality and use Image tag of nextjs

name: DevOps Projects | Real Time DevOps & GitOps Projects
description: Master Your DevOps Skills with Real challenge Ever wondered about DevOps Projects in Real Time?  Wanted some hands on experience in those projects? Wished you create Continuous Delivery pipelines and automation frameworks for the IT organizations? That sounds Impossible without getting into the PROJECTS in Real Time.
prerequisites: Knowledge in Linux, Networking Fundamentals, AWS, Ansible, Jenkins are must.

syllabus.content: VM Setup MacOS M1 Chip, Multi Tier Web Application Setup, Locally

syllabus.topic: Re-Architecting Web app on AWS Cloud
syllabus.content: Containerization of Java Project using Docker

syllabus.topic: Jenkins Pipeline as a code (Groovy) Project
syllabus.content: Continuous Integration using Jenkins, Nexus, Soanrqube & Slack
Continuous Delivery and configuration Management
